question: Which country's professional basketball league is "National Basketball Association"?
explanation: United States of America's professional basketball league is "National Basketball Association". The National Basketball Association (NBA) is an American men's professional basketball league. It is composed of 30 teams (29 in the United States and 1 in Canada) and is one of the four major professional sports leagues in the United States and Canada. It is the premier men's professional basketball league in the world.
